tool_description: Machine learning model based Named entity recognition (NER)  from the given text and article.
name: entity-extractor
title: entity-extractor

api_list.name: entity-extraction
api_list.description: Extract entities from the article using machine learning
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://entity-extractor.p.rapidapi.com/ner"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "entity-extractor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://entity-extractor.p.rapidapi.com/ner"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "entity-extractor.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
